mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string != cleaned_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', 'MUTATED', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::--1]
